entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content: Hello there! Call me Zeta, and welcome to my scale modelling blog Zeta Plamo! I’m an avid builder and collector of scale models, specifically Gunpla which are Gundam plastic model kits. I hope you’ll stick around and check out my modelling exploits, be it giant robots or otherwise! Look out for more posts soon, cheers!
entry.summary: Hello there! Call me Zeta, and welcome to my scale modelling blog Zeta Plamo!
